description:
Dry Creek School is a kindergarten-6th grade elementary school located in Rio Linda, California, in the Twin Rivers Unified School District. We have a hardworking culture that
encourages its students to always give their best and never give up. Our mission is to promote an environment of high academic achievement, kindness, culture and strong community values.

The staff at Dry Creek prides itself on providing a nurturing and safe environment that facilitates academic achievement. Students will be immersed in a rigorous and challenging curriculum to prepare them to be college and career ready. We serve approximately 450 TK through sixth-grade students who speak 12 languages.Â
